1.title: Origin
1.plot: Detective Travis Wane meets his new partner, Detective Ana Scott. While working out their differences, they are pulled on a homicide case where the bodies keep piling up. And it leads a British real estate broker/mob boss, Charles FaLone.

2.title: The Hit
2.plot: Detective Scott finds out that a hit was put on her head. While Detective Wane has to track her down and you find out how he found his special ability.

3.title: Full Circle
3.plot: Detective Wane meets up with the person that cause his vision to be the way it is. We also learn about Detective's Scott's troubled past.

4.title: Witness
4.plot: Young Brittany witness a hit ordered by Charles FaLone. Travis and Ana must get to her before FaLone's men does.

imdb.plot outline: His sight was altered when he was just a "rookie cop" for the NYPD. Now it's the year 2018 and Travis Wane is now one of the New York City Police best "Homicide Detectives"; cleaning up the dirty streets of Manhattan, NY. He's armed only with a straight sword concealed in a pearl "Cobra Headed" cane. He's also been trained to increase his other four senses to supernatural levels by a Ninja Master. Travis is also teamed up with a hot-tempered Hispanic detective, Ana Scott; who's a high level black belt in Tae Kwon Do and a marksman with a 9mm biretta. Their mission is to take down a mob boss and loan shark, Charles FaLone; he is parading as a Real Estate Investor that thinks he's above the law.
imdb.title: Wind & Fire: Anime Series
